dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Legal Correspondence]

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, April 21, 2005 9:41 PM
To: Copyright Compliance
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Legal Correspondence]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

- -------- Original Message --------

If you have received it in error, please delete it from your system. Do not

and notify the sender immediately. Please note that the BBC monitors e-mails
sent or received.
Further communication will signify your consent to this.
